pkgmetadata.longdescription: clldmpg=======Python library providing common functionality for CLLD apps maintained in affiliationwith the MPG.Provides an MPG specific pyramid app scaffold and a pyramid package to be included bya clld app.Note: The `templates` directory provided by this package must be specified in an app's `appconf.ini`in the correct position to make template lookup work, e.g.```ini[mako]directories_list = concepticon:templates clldmpg:templates clld:web/templates```
